set.name: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 7 or more cards in your hand during your turn, you may summon a Liquid People for no cost once per turn. ■ At the end of each of your turns, draw a card for each of your tapped Liquid People in the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ Your opponent's attacking creatures attack this creature if able. ■ When this creature battles, destroy this creature and your opponent's creature after the battle.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following: ► Tap all your opponent's creatures: ► Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 6000 or more and return it to its owner's hand. Then, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. ■ Draw a card. ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Race
property.value: God Nova/Angel Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may choose a spell from among them that costs 6 or less and cast it for no cost. Put the rest into your graveyard. {LEFT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Right God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.) ■ While this creature is linked, this creature breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Race
property.value: Blue Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent summons a creature or casts a spell, this turn, your opponent's creatures can't attack or block.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water or fire creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a water, darkness, or fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks one of your opponents and isn't blocked, if you have 7 or more Dreammate creatures, you win the game. Otherwise, stop the attack.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Type
property.value: Exile Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage MAX

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 8000 or less. ■ During your turn, you may summon a creature from your mana zone. {DORON GO} Out:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Out" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Outlaw" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ATTACK CHANCE}: Beethoven, Zenith of "Horror" (When one of your Beethoven, Zenith of "Horror"s attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Draw up to 5 cards. Then your opponent chooses 3 cards in your hand at random and you reveal them to your opponent. You may put any number of Dragons from among them.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage MAX

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck, bottom of your deck or both in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put up to 2 Fire psychic creatures that have total cost 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Race
property.value: Earth Eater/Cyber Lord/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a light, water, or darkness psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose a non-psychic creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Put a water or darkness psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ If you put a light psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. ■ If you put a nature psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Race
property.value: Beast Folk/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Choose one of the following. ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a nature psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block. ■ Victory Psychic Link—If you have Ryusei Kaiser, the Victorious and Gaial Kaiser, the Victorious in the battle zone, link them to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ You and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)
